purpose: The email is a Call for Papers (CFP) for the 28th Brazilian Symposium on Formal Methods (SBMF 2025), which will take place in Recife, Brazil, from December 3-5, 2025. It outlines important dates for paper registration and submission, as well as guidelines for submissions, including categories for regular and short papers. The symposium aims to promote the development and use of formal methods in computational systems and invites contributions that present original work in this field. Additionally, it provides information about invited speakers, committees, and publication details for accepted papers.
